text:
@JackPosobiec To be clear:

Gates/Soros are using COVID-19 to further their agenda. Of that there can be no doubt.

As to the origins? We will probably never know for sure if it was intentional vs bad containment.

China hasn't actually been forthcoming with the truth...go figure.
